name: [UE4 GameJam] Sry, Your Ded
description:
It's a bit weird; But for once, I actually stuck to the theme, How weird!

Keyboard and mouse are pretty much required. There's gamepad support but it's patchy in parts and can cause gamebreaking glitches.

Sadly, This is my final gamejam for a couple years; In a month, Little Kitatus will be born and thus, It'll be all work, work, work and bonding with Mini Kitatus :)

I want to thank everyone whose played my jam games and hopefully this one will give you a couple kicks.

The Unreal Gamejams are awesome and I want to thank Epic for letting me participate in them all and have so much fun in making the games!

Thanks Epic you rock!

And thanks to everyone else submitting; Month after month, Everybody's games get EVEN better, I look forward to playing everyone's games!

Muchos Love everyone,
Kitatus
